original: @120a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @120a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'a rya mnydzu shr'i n'a ma sam g'i ti sarba mandala sto tra /
analyzed: a'a rya mnydzu shr'i n'a ma sam g'i ti sarba mandala sto tra /
translated: Ārya-mañjuśrī-nāma-saṃgīti-sarva-maṇḍala-stotram

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la bstod pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la bstod pa /
translated: The Praise of All the Maṇḍalas of the Noble Mañjuśrī’s Names

original: phyi dang nang dang de'i nang na //
analyzed: phyi dang nang dang de'i nang na //
translated: Outside, inside, and within that,

original: sku gsum bdag nyid la bzhugs pa //
analyzed: sku gsum bdag nyid la bzhugs pa //
translated: Dwelling in the nature of the three kāyas,

original: snying rje shes rab rjes zhugs pa //
analyzed: snying rje shes rab rjes zhugs pa //
translated: Compassion and wisdom combined,

original: gzhon nu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo ;
analyzed: gzhon nu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo ;
translated: Youthful One, I pay homage to you.🔽Purified in every way,🔽Stainless in every way,🔽Dwelling in all phenomena,🔽Teaching all phenomena as one,

original: / rnam kun rnam par byang chub dang // rnam kun dri ma med pa dang // chos rnams kun la gnas pa dang // chos kun gcig tu ston pa dang // rnam kun tshul la 'jug pa dang // rnam kun tshul la gnas pa dang //
analyzed: / rnam kun rnam par byang chub dang // rnam kun dri ma med pa dang // chos rnams kun la gnas pa dang // chos kun gcig tu ston pa dang // rnam kun tshul la 'jug pa dang // rnam kun tshul la gnas pa dang //
translated: Engaging in all modes,🔽Dwelling in all modes,🔽The single mode of all meanings,

original: rnam pa kun gyi don tshul gcig /'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: rnam pa kun gyi don tshul gcig /'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise Mañjughoṣa.🔽Playful, laughing, ugly,

original: sgeg dang bzhad dang mi sdug dang // drag po'i ngo mtshar nyams bdag nyid //
analyzed: sgeg dang bzhad dang mi sdug dang // drag po'i ngo mtshar nyams bdag nyid //
translated: Terrifying, wondrous, and majestic,

original: nyon mongs gcod dang shes rab can //
analyzed: nyon mongs gcod dang shes rab can //
translated: You are the one who cuts through afflictions and has wisdom.

original: dang po'i sangs rgyas khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: dang po'i sangs rgyas khyod la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, the primordial Buddha.🔽You have abandoned existence and peace,

original: srid dang zhi ba spangs pa dang // srid dang zhi bar bzhugs par mdzad //
analyzed: srid dang zhi ba spangs pa dang // srid dang zhi bar bzhugs par mdzad //
translated: And abide in existence and peace.

original: zla ba gzhon @120b nu ltar mdzes pa //
analyzed: zla ba gzhon @120b nu ltar mdzes pa //
translated: You are as beautiful as the youthful moon.

original: chos sku de la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: chos sku de la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to that dharmakaya.🔽You abide as the life-force

original: chos rnams thams cad stong nyid kyi //🔽srog tu khyod ni bzhugs pa yin //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad stong nyid kyi // srog tu khyod ni bzhugs pa yin //
translated: Of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: mtshan ma la yang mtshan ma med //
analyzed: mtshan ma la yang mtshan ma med //
translated: Signs are also signless.

original: dbang phyug che la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: dbang phyug che la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise Mahesvara.

original: khyod mi bzhugs na spros 'di la //
analyzed: khyod mi bzhugs na spros 'di la //
translated: If you do not abide here,

original: ji ltar yang ni smon pa yin //
analyzed: ji ltar yang ni smon pa yin //
translated: How can this proliferation be wished for?

original: khyed 'dir rjes su zhugs na ni //
analyzed: khyed 'dir rjes su zhugs na ni //
translated: If you enter here,

original: 'di la smon la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: 'di la smon la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise this wish.

original: thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba //
analyzed: thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba //
translated: Virtuous in the beginning, middle, and end,

original: 'di ni rang nyid 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: 'di ni rang nyid 'od gsal ba //
translated: This is self-luminous.

original: phrin las rjes su 'jug pa yin //
analyzed: phrin las rjes su 'jug pa yin //
translated: It is the engagement in activity.

original: sna tshogs ston la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: sna tshogs ston la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the one who displays variety.

original: lta ba rtog dag las 'tsho ba //
analyzed: lta ba rtog dag las 'tsho ba //
translated: View, thought, and pure livelihood,

original: rtsol dang dran dang ting 'dzin gyi //
analyzed: rtsol dang dran dang ting 'dzin gyi //
translated: Effort, mindfulness, and samadhi,

original: 'phags ai yan lag 'khor lo mdzes //
analyzed: 'phags ai yan lag 'khor lo mdzes //
translated: The noble one with beautiful limbs and wheels,

original: 'khor los sgyur la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the one with wheels.🔽The one with the nature of the relative,🔽the one who gathers sentient beings,🔽the one who illuminates pure virtue,

original: rang bzhin gyis ni kun rdzob dang // sems can rnams kyi bsdu ba dang // dge ba dri med snang ba dang // smin byed de la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni kun rdzob dang // sems can rnams kyi bsdu ba dang // dge ba dri med snang ba dang // smin byed de la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the one who ripens.🔽The one who gives material things and fearlessness,

original: zang zing mi 'jigs spyin byed dang // byams pa spyin byed mchog dang ni //
analyzed: zang zing mi 'jigs spyin byed dang // byams pa spyin byed mchog dang ni //
translated: the one who gives love and is supreme,

original: chos spyin chos kyi dbang phyug gi //
analyzed: chos spyin chos kyi dbang phyug gi //
translated: the one who gives the Dharma and is the lord of the Dharma,

original: chen po de la phyag 'tshal bstod //🔽zhi gnas lhag mthong dag gi ni //
analyzed: chen po de la phyag 'tshal bstod // zhi gnas lhag mthong dag gi ni //
translated: I pay homage and praise the great one.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin par 'gro //🔽nyon mongs gcod pa'i shes rab kyi //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin par 'gro // nyon mongs gcod pa'i shes rab kyi //
translated: The one who goes to the perfection of wisdom🔽through shamatha and vipashyana,🔽the one who holds the sword of wisdom

original: ral gri bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: ral gri bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: that cuts through afflictions, I pay homage and praise.🔽The one who delights the realms of sentient beings

original: sems can khams ni mgu ba dang // rdzu 'phrul rkang pa chen pos gnon //
analyzed: sems can khams ni mgu ba dang // rdzu 'phrul rkang pa chen pos gnon //
translated: and conquers with the great bases of miraculous powers,

original: ba stan pa so so rang rig gi //
analyzed: ba stan pa so so rang rig gi //
translated: the one who protects with the wisdom of individual self-awareness,

original: skyob pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: skyob pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the savior and protector.

original: go cha chen po bgos pa dang // 'jug pa che la gnas pa dang // so sor rtog par byed pa dang // bya ba nan tan de la bstod //
analyzed: go cha chen po bgos pa dang // 'jug pa che la gnas pa dang // so sor rtog par byed pa dang // bya ba nan tan de la bstod //
translated: and one praises that activity.

original: spyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
analyzed: spyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
translated: Generosity, discipline, patience, diligence,🔽concentration, wisdom, great power,

original: bsam gtan shes rab stobs chen dang // thabs dang smon lam ye shes kyi //
analyzed: bsam gtan shes rab stobs chen dang // thabs dang smon lam ye shes kyi //
translated: skillful means, aspiration, and wisdom—

original: pha rol phyin la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: pha rol phyin la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the perfections.

original: brgya dang drug cu'i grangs kyis ni //
analyzed: brgya dang drug cu'i grangs kyis ni //
translated: With the number of one hundred and sixty,

original: dpal gyi byang chub 'gro ba'i gtso //
analyzed: dpal gyi byang chub 'gro ba'i gtso //
translated: the chief of migrating beings, glorious enlightenment,🔽even a single one has sixteen aspects—

original: gang zhig gcig kyang rnam bcu drug /'dod chags che la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: gang zhig gcig kyang rnam bcu drug /'dod chags che la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the great desire.🔽Wearing the breastplate of love,🔽wearing the armor of sharp knowledge,🔽the wise one of great compassion,

original: byams pa'i ya lad bgos pa dang // shes srab go cha bgos pa dang // snying rje chen po blo ldan dang // ye shes tog la phag 'tshal bstod //🔽bzang po'i lam la @121a * //
analyzed: byams pa'i ya lad bgos pa dang // shes srab go cha bgos pa dang // snying rje chen po blo ldan dang // ye shes tog la phag 'tshal bstod // bzang po'i lam la @121a * //
translated: I pay homage and praise the crest of wisdom.🔽Placing sentient beings

original: sems can rnams //
analyzed: sems can rnams //
translated: on the excellent path,🔽protecting them, and with profound mind,

original: 'jog cing skyob par byed pa dang // zab pa'i blo dang rgya mtsho bzhin //
analyzed: 'jog cing skyob par byed pa dang // zab pa'i blo dang rgya mtsho bzhin //
translated: like the ocean,

original: mi zad blo yi gter la 'dud //🔽dbyer med spobs pa dag gis ni //
analyzed: mi zad blo yi gter la 'dud // dbyer med spobs pa dag gis ni //
translated: I bow to the inexhaustible treasure of the mind.🔽I bow to the perfection of power,

original: stobs kyi pha rol phyin la 'dud //
analyzed: stobs kyi pha rol phyin la 'dud //
translated: With the confidence of inseparability.🔽I bow to the one who completely leads

original: bgrod dka'i ngan song chen po las //🔽kun du 'dren la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: bgrod dka'i ngan song chen po las // kun du 'dren la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Out of the great lower realms, so difficult to traverse.🔽I bow to the light of the net,

original: mya ngan mun pa nges 'joms dang // dra ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal bstod //🔽rnam kun bdud rtsir 'dzag pa yi //
analyzed: mya ngan mun pa nges 'joms dang // dra ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal bstod // rnam kun bdud rtsir 'dzag pa yi //
translated: Which definitely conquers the darkness of misery.

original: zla ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: zla ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I bow to the light of the moon,

original: 'od dpag med dang sprin med pa'i //
analyzed: 'od dpag med dang sprin med pa'i //
translated: Which always drips with nectar.

original: nam mkha'i snying po phyag 'tshal bstod ;
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po phyag 'tshal bstod ;
translated: I bow to the heart of space,🔽Akṣobhya and Cloudless.

original: / sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la //
analyzed: / sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la //
translated: I bow to Sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin,

original: phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: I bow down and bow again and again.

original: dad dang brtson 'grus dran bsam gtan //
analyzed: dad dang brtson 'grus dran bsam gtan //
translated: Faith, diligence, mindfulness, concentration,

original: shes rab kyis ni rjes bsrungs pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyis ni rjes bsrungs pa //
translated: And wisdom are the guardians.🔽I bow to the king of the marvelous subduer,

original: srung ba med kyang 'od dag ni //🔽gnon pa rmad byung rgyal la 'dud //
analyzed: srung ba med kyang 'od dag ni // gnon pa rmad byung rgyal la 'dud //
translated: Whose light is not guarded, but pure.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid kyi //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid kyi //
translated: I bow to the one who is the nature of the dharmadhātu,

original: la lar rdo rje sems dpa' dang // nyon mongs shes bya spangs pa yi //
analyzed: la lar rdo rje sems dpa' dang // nyon mongs shes bya spangs pa yi //
translated: To some, Vajrasattva,🔽To some, Vairocana,🔽To some, Vajrahuṃkāra,🔽To some, Padmanarteśvara,

original: la lar rnam par snang mdzad dang // la lar rdo rje h'um mdzad dang // la lar padma gar dbang phyug / la lar rdo rje nyi ma ni //🔽rgya chen rmad byung chen po mdzes //
analyzed: la lar rnam par snang mdzad dang // la lar rdo rje h'um mdzad dang // la lar padma gar dbang phyug / la lar rdo rje nyi ma ni // rgya chen rmad byung chen po mdzes //
translated: To some, Vajrasūrya,🔽To some, Aśokottama,🔽To some, Lokeśvara,

original: gcig gi bdag nyid rta mchog dang // la lar gsum gyi bdag nyid dang // gang zhig rnam lnga'i sna tshogs pa'i //
analyzed: gcig gi bdag nyid rta mchog dang // la lar gsum gyi bdag nyid dang // gang zhig rnam lnga'i sna tshogs pa'i //
translated: To some, Vajrapāṇi,🔽To some, Vajrasādhu,

original: skyob pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽gnyis med 'byung ba'i chos nyid phyir //
analyzed: skyob pa de la phyag 'tshal lo // gnyis med 'byung ba'i chos nyid phyir //
translated: To some, Vajrarāja,🔽To some, Vajratejas,🔽To some, Vajrarāga,

original: 'khor los sgyur gyi rigs 'dzin pa //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur gyi rigs 'dzin pa //
translated: To some, Vajrasādhana,🔽To some, Vajrahetu,

original: gcig kyang sna tshogs bdag nyid kyi //🔽rnam par snang mdzad che la 'dud //
analyzed: gcig kyang sna tshogs bdag nyid kyi // rnam par snang mdzad che la 'dud //
translated: To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajrakarma,🔽To some, Vajrarakṣa,

original: mtshan brjod dkyil 'khor ma lus la //
analyzed: mtshan brjod dkyil 'khor ma lus la //
translated: To some, Vajrayakṣa,🔽To some, Vajravijaya,🔽To some, Vajrahāsa,🔽To some, Vajrasukha,

original: bstod pas bsod nams gang skyes pa //
analyzed: bstod pas bsod nams gang skyes pa //
translated: To some, Vajrarati,🔽To some, Vajrasādhya,🔽To some, Vajrayudha,🔽To some, Vajraketu,🔽To some, Vajrarāja,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,

original: dge ba 'di yis sems can rnams //
analyzed: dge ba 'di yis sems can rnams //
translated: To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviśva,🔽To some, Vajraviś

original: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'grub par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la bstod pa //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'grub par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la bstod pa //
translated: The praise of all the maṇḍalas of the Noble Mañjuśrī's Praise of the Names is complete.

original: slob dpon so ma shr'is mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon so ma shr'is mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: Composed by Ācārya Somaśrī.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma h'a dzny'a na dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma h'a dzny'a na dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
translated: Translated and finalized by the Indian preceptor Mahājana and the Tibetan translator-monk Shönuö.
